author.desc: Displays the author and year in the format in which it is to be used in conjunction with the canonical name. eg: (Pallas, 1811)
author.title: Author and Year

canonical.desc: Displays the canonical name ie. the full name without author and year.
canonical.title: Canonical

id.desc: The ID number of the name on the match database.
id.title: ID

name.desc: Displays the verbatim name ie. the full name with author and year if known.
name.title: Name

position.desc: Displays the list in which the name is currently present.
position.title: Position

rank.desc: Displays the taxonomic rank of the name within its IBP hierarchy.
rank.title: Rank

source.desc: Displays the last database against which the name was resolved. If no database name is provided this could be author curated.
source.title: Source

status.desc: Displays the current nomenclatural status of the name as recognised on Portal.
status.title: Status

via.desc: Displays the original source from which the data was sourced into the match database.
via.title: via

name_matching.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this scientific name?
name_matching.description: This functionality allows you to match a list of provided names to the portal's taxonomy. To validate scientific names, upload a spreadsheet (.xlsx) containing one column with valid scientific names. The system will display matches to the provided names. Select a match and download the resulting sheet, which will include a TaxonConceptId column.
name_matching.no_species_page: Species Page does not exist for this name match
name_matching.species_create_description: Click on species name for creating species
name_matching.species_page_exist: Species Page exists for this name match
name_matching.warning_text: Warning: Couldn't find any matches for the following species name!

request.placeholder: Please give a brief overview of your knowledge and experience regarding the chosen taxon (Max 200 characters)
request.title: Request Permission
